title: DDwe
author: DDwe
content: Anyone have wallet.dat file of the bitcoin address 1FeexV6bAHb8ybZjqQMjJrcCrHGW9sb6uF with 79,957 bitcoins? Please send the link to buy the wallet.dat file.

comments.author: Edwardard
comments.body: Quote from: DDwe on December 23, 2022, 03:45:22 PMAnyone have wallet.dat file of the bitcoin address 1FeexV6bAHb8ybZjqQMjJrcCrHGW9sb6uF with 79,957 bitcoins? Please send the link to buy the wallet.dat file.Lol, why are you interested in buying the wallet.dat of someone else's wallet ? Why would they give it to you? And even if the file is hacked by someone, they would try to bruteforce and get those coins for themselves and not sell it to you for few bucks. Whats your incentive here? Instead, Im sure if someone provides you a wallet.dat file here, its going to be a new malware straight into your PC, be warned!

comments.author: DDwe
comments.created_time: December 23, 2022, 06:41:32 PMLast edit: December 23, 2022, 06:52:30 PM by DDwe
comments.body: Quote from: Edwardard on December 23, 2022, 04:20:23 PMQuote from: DDwe on December 23, 2022, 03:45:22 PMAnyone have wallet.dat file of the bitcoin address 1FeexV6bAHb8ybZjqQMjJrcCrHGW9sb6uF with 79,957 bitcoins? Please send the link to buy the wallet.dat file.Lol, why are you interested in buying the wallet.dat of someone else's wallet ? Why would they give it to you? And even if the file is hacked by someone, they would try to bruteforce and get those coins for themselves and not sell it to you for few bucks. Whats your incentive here? Instead, Im sure if someone provides you a wallet.dat file here, its going to be a new malware straight into your PC, be warned!It is not me who is going to buy it. Someone else (a person who deals lost bitcoin files on darknet marketplaces) needs the file and they are willing to pay up to 50 bitcoins for it. They need the link to buy it and asked me to search for the file for payment. Even if it is a scam, I would not lose anything, they are.

comments.author: DDwe
comments.body: Also, does anyone have the wallet.dat file of 12tkqA9xSoowkzoERHMWNKsTey55YEBqkv with 28,151 BTC? The buyer would be willing to pay 27 BTC for the file.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Do you know what that address is? This is the address of the hacker who hacked the infamous Mt Gox exchange. Do you think the hacker who hacked that exchange would put up a wallet.dat with that many bitcoins for sale? If you find a link to this wallet.dat for sale somewhere, it will either be a fake file or a file containing a trojan.

comments.author: DDwe
comments.body: The wallet.dat files of these bitcoin addresses are in high demand (even if they are a scam or virus, buyers on the darknet are willing to pay many bitcoins for the files and anyone who can find the link to the files):1FeexV6bAHb8ybZjqQMjJrcCrHGW9sb6uF (79,957 BTC)1LdRcdxfbSnmCYYNdeYpUnztiYzVfBEQeC (53,880 BTC)1LruNZjwamWJXThX2Y8C2d47QqhAkkc5os (44,000 BTC)12ib7dApVFvg82TXKycWBNpN8kFyiAN1dr (31,000 BTC)12tkqA9xSoowkzoERHMWNKsTey55YEBqkv (28,151 BTC)167ZWTT8n6s4ya8cGjqNNQjDwDGY31vmHg (8,999 BTC)1CUgoX3RVZx3rdtfAK8Mus6XWL9PgXzC5g (2,036 BTC)

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: DDwe on December 23, 2022, 10:33:29 PM12ib7dApVFvg82TXKycWBNpN8kFyiAN1dr (31,000 BTC)Here is a link to the wallet.dat file of this address. From this link you can buy the cherished wallet.dat with lots of bitcoins  But do not blame me if this file turns out to be fake or with a virus. I hope, that you will send me at least one bitcoin as a fee for search Code:https://satoshidisk.com/pay/CEu1tX

comments.author: icynote_original
comments.body: I have several wallet.dat whose passwords have been forgotten. Maybe your buyer is interested? I have a recovery method but i don't have adequate device.I have thoughts of rallying investors to buy the equipment needed to set up this project. for sure this method has been tested well, but I can't share a way to find lost passwords.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: Ratimov on July 06, 2023, 09:54:55 AMNo one should deal with icynote_originalI noticed him spamming the tech boards with chatbot shitposts, but didn't have time to report him this morning. I'm glad to see he's banned already, and at least 10 of his posts have been deleted.
